root.title: Malinovka (e-56)
root.place: Found in a barrow in plane near the Uyk river in 1 km westwards Malinovka village in 1947. Rygdylon found again and moved to the Minusinsk museum in 1948.
root.store: The monument has been lost later.
root.general: Құлпытас құмдақ тастан жасалған. Қимасында көпқырлы қисықтау болып келген. 515
root.description: The stele made from sandstone, polygonal in section of wrong form. There are 2 lines of text scratched vertically. Copies of inscription made by scientists significantly differ from each other. I.L.Kyzlasov has made reconstruction.
root.size: Height – 100 cm, length – 40 cm, width – 15-20 cm.
root.investigation: Kiselyov found in 1947. Investigated by E.R.Rygdylon 490. R.Kyzlasov 491 492, I.L.Kyzlasov 493.

pdf.f_title: Памятники тюркской рунической письменности азиатского ареала.
